recent_releases.repo_description: ⌨️ A Command Line Interface to help orchestrate the integration of heterogenous data sources under a common RDF Knowledge Graph using Python, RML mappings, Bash, and GitHub Actions workflows
📖 Documentation for the Data Science Research Infrastructure at Maastricht University
recent_releases.release_description: Documentation for the Data Science Research Infrastructure cluster based on OKD3.11 and MapR storage

recent_releases.repo_description: 💬 Translator Standard APIs for the Knowledge Collaboratory (nanopublications)
recent_releases.release_description:
First release of the Knowledge Collaboratory API:
* Supports [Translator Reasoner API](https://github.com/NCATSTranslator/ReasonerAPI) `v1.0.0-beta` with `/query` and `/predicates` operations
* Supports returning the Knowledge Collaboratory nanopublications as [`KGX`](https://github.com/biolink/kgx) dumps
* Use the [Nanopublications network](http://nanopub.org/wordpress/) as main backend to publish and retrieve claims in a BioLink-compliant format
* Published as a SmartAPI at https://smart-api.info/ui/89054eff6ee6d91641d278d9ffdb3993

recent_releases.repo_description: 🔮🐍 Translator API to compute and serve predictions of biomedical concepts associations
recent_releases.release_description:
* Improve the OpenPredict API storage and reuse of models when new embeddings are added
* Use `.ttl` file locally to store OpenPredict metadata
* Make the `/predict` call compatible with the BioThings Explorer operations annotations

recent_releases.repo_description: The Semanticscience Integrated Ontology (SIO) provides a simple, integrated ontology of types and relations for rich description of objects, processes and their attributes.
